Package controllers

Class AccountController

java.lang.Object
controllers.AccountController
All Implemented Interfaces:
FilePath, GetInput, PasswordReset
public class AccountController extends Object implements GetInput, PasswordReset, FilePath
Handles account-related operations such as login and registration.

  • Method Details

    • loginProcess

      public static User loginProcess(int choice, Scanner sc, Map<String,String> users, PasswordHasher passwordHasher, UserDatabase db, AuthenticationController ac)
      Handles the login process for a user. Prompts for NRIC and password, verifies them against stored credentials, and returns the authenticated user. If the user logs in with a default password, prompts for a password reset.
      Parameters:
      choice - user's menu choice input during retry prompts
      sc - Scanner object for reading user input
      users - Map of NRIC to hashed passwords
      passwordHasher - PasswordHasher utility for verifying passwords
      db - UserDatabase instance for retrieving user data
      ac - AuthenticationController instance for validation logic
      Returns:
      the logged-in User object

    • register

      public static void register(UserDatabase db, Scanner sc, Map<String,String> users, PasswordHasher passwordHasher)
      Handles user registration. Prompts for user details, validates inputs, hashes password, stores login and user information into respective files. Also handles role-based registration, including admin password checks for Officer/Manager roles.
      Parameters:
      db - UserDatabase instance for writing user data
      sc - Scanner object for reading user input
      users - Map of existing users to validate uniqueness of NRIC
      passwordHasher - PasswordHasher utility for hashing passwords
